Title: Amends chapter 668 of the laws of 1977, amending the volunteer firefighters' benefit law relating to disability due to disease or malfunction of the heart or coronary arteries, in relation to the effectiveness
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of provisions relating to disability due to disease or malfunction of the heart or coronary arteries.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 668 of the laws of 1977, amending the volunteer firefighters' benefit law relating to disability due to disease or malfunction of the heart or coronary arteries, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
